remarks: Derive colinearity from betweenness (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2019.)
statement:
tgbtwnconn.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tgbtwnconn.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tgbtwnconn.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tgbtwnconn.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconnln1.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
tgbtwnconnln1.1 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
tgbtwnconnln1.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A I C ) ) $.
tgbtwnconnln1.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A I D ) ) $.
tgbtwnconnln1 $p |- ( ph -> ( A e. ( C L D ) \/ C = D ) ) $.
